talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Injured adventurer$
Krrh... The black knight appeared and abducted the Prophet.
The soldiers and I tried to stop him but... we were no match for him.

$Injured adventurer$
Ughh... They couldn't have gotten far....
Don't worry about us. Please go and save the girl. The girl....
(It seems like his injuries are too serious for him to talk)
